arts.ttl: Schalke start season with victory over Hertha Berlin
arts.sum: Schalke enjoyed a winning start to the 2025/26 Bundesliga 2 season with a 2-1 victory at home to Hertha Berlin in the campaign opener. Within the opening 10 minutes, Moussa Sylla, Ron Schallenberg and Christopher Antwi-Adjei all had attempts on goal as the hosts signalled their attacking intent.

arts.ttl: Report | Schalke 2-1 Hertha Berlin – Moussa Sylla stars as Mario Muslić’s tenure off to a winning start
arts.sum: Mario Muslić got his tenure at Schalke off to a winning start with a 2-1 win against Hertha Berlin in the 2. Bundesliga curtain-raiser on Friday night. Moussa Sylla –…

arts.ttl: Schalke sink Hertha to get off to perfect start in 2. Bundesliga
arts.sum: Schalke started the Milon Muslic era perfectly as they beat Hertha BSC by two goals to one on the opening night of the 2. Bundesliga.

arts.ttl: Confirmed lineups: Schalke 04 vs. Hertha BSC
arts.sum: The lineups have been announced ahead of tonight's clash at the Veltins Arena between Schalke 04 and Hertha BSC.

arts.ttl: FC Schalke 04 vs Hertha BSC Preview: Mouthwatering curtain-raiser in the 2. Bundesliga
arts.sum: Schalke 04 host Hertha BSC at the Veltins-Arena this Friday evening in what promises to be a highly anticipated clash, as both sides aim to kick off the new campaign on a positive note.

arts.ttl: "There’s hardly anything bigger": Schalke’s Timo Becker fired up for Hertha opener
arts.sum: A new season brings fresh hope at FC Schalke 04, with defender Timo Becker confident the club can present a different face in the 2. Bundesliga after last year’s disastrous campaign.
